TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi MenuItem extends System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl implements class System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource
Public Class MenuItem Inherits HeaderedItemsControl Implements ICommandSource
type MenuItem = class inherit HeaderedItemsControl interface ICommandSource

summary.span: 表示 内某个可选择的项。

span.span: Represents a selectable item inside a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个, 它表示对象的标头和集合可以是任何类型 (如字符串、图像或面板)。 is a , which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 可以具有子菜单。A can have submenus. 的子菜单由的中的对象组成。The submenu of the is made up of the objects within the of a . 通常 , 包含其他对象来创建嵌套的子菜单。It is common for a to contain other objects to create nested submenus. 可以具有以下多个函数之一:A can have one of several functions: - 可以选择它来调用命令。It can be selected to invoke a command. - 它可以是其他菜单项的分隔符。It can be a separator for other menu items. - 它可以是子菜单的标头。It can be a header for a submenu. - 可以选中或取消选中此项。It can be checked or unchecked. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下, 的设置为。By default, the of a is set to . 的默认水平位置是。 The default horizontal position of a is . 如果 通过将的属性设置为,则将应用堆栈面板的默认值,并将项目居中。If you set the property of a through a , the stack panel's default is applied and the item is centered. 处理事件, 因此, 如果将事件处理程序附加到, 则永远不会调用您的处理程序。 The handles the event, so if you attach an event handler to , your handler will never be called. 若要添加自己的处理程序, 请 通过在`handledEventsToo`设置为`true`的情况下调用来订阅事件或订阅。To add your own handler, subscribe to the event or subscribe to by calling with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`. ## 自定义 MenuItem 控件Customizing the MenuItem Control 若要对多个控件应用相同的属性设置, 请使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认值 , 为控件指定独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息, 请参阅[通过创建 system.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看特定于的部分和状态, 请参阅[菜单样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/menu-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Menu Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/menu-styles-and-templates.md). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性, 则当控件出现在应用程序中时, 属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个来操作中的文本。The following example creates a to manipulate text in a . 包含使用、和属性以及、和事件的对象。 The contains objects that use the , , and properties and the , , and events. [!code-xaml[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ Command { System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ value); };
member this.Command : System.Windows.Input.ICommand with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与菜单项关联的命令。

span.span: Gets or sets the command associated with the menu item.
The command associated with the .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于将命令与特定实例关联。This property is used to associate a command with a particular instance. 下面的示例将**Copy**命令与关联, 并自动提供输入笔势文本**Ctrl + C**。The following example associates the **Copy** command with a and automatically supplies the input gesture text **Ctrl+C**. 该示例未设置属性, 但在运行时为 "复制"。The example does not set the property, but the for the is "Copy" at run time. 如果你希望其他标头不同 , 则可以为该标头指定。You can specify another header for the if you want it to be different. 有关如何绑定到所需命令的信息, 请参阅[向 MenuItem 添加命令](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741839(v=vs.90))。For information on how to bind to the desired command, see [Add a Command to a MenuItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741839(v=vs.90)). [!code-xaml[MenuItems_snip#MenuItemCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItems_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#menuitemcommand)] 当单击时 , 将在事件发生后引发命令。A command is raised when a is clicked - just after the event. 根据以下优先级在元素上引发命令:The command is raised on the element according to the following priorities: 1. 如果 在上设置, 则使用该元素。If is set on the , that element is used. 2. 包含 的的 。The of a that contains the . 3. 包含的主窗口的焦点目标。The focus target of the main window that contains a . 4. 被单击的 。The that was clicked. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用命令属性将命令与菜单项相关联。The following examples show how to use the command property to associate commands with menu items. [!code-xaml[MenuEvent#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#8)] [!code-csharp[MenuEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 许多控件的元素中不仅仅包含文本。Many controls have more than just text in the elements. 通常有图标、复选标记、加速器和箭头来指示子菜单。Often there are icons, check marks, accelerators, and arrows to indicate submenus. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个带有图标的菜单项。The following example creates a menu item with an icon. summary.span: 设置文本，以描述将调用与指定项关联的命令的输入笔势。

span.span: Sets the text describing an input gesture that will call the command tied to the specified item.

value.span: 描述输入笔势的文本, 例如 "**复制**" 命令的**Ctrl + C** 。

span.span: The text that describes the input gesture, such as **Ctrl+C** for the **Copy** command.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不会将输入笔势与菜单项相关联;它只是向菜单项添加文本。This property does not associate the input gesture with the menu item; it simply adds text to the menu item. 应用程序必须处理用户的输入才能执行操作。The application must handle the user's input to carry out the action. 有关如何将命令与菜单项关联的信息, 请参阅。For information on how to associate a command with a menu item, see . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性将键盘快捷方式文本分配给菜单项。The following examples show how to use the property to assign keyboard shortcuts text to menu items. remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 .NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1 开始, 属性具有受保护的资源库。Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, the property has a protected setter. 若要使用此功能, 应用程序应面向 .NET Framework 版本3.5。To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见 [.NET Framework 版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定是否突出显示菜单项。The following example shows how to determine whether a menu item is highlighted. remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 .NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1 开始, 属性具有受保护的资源库。Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, the property has a protected setter. 若要使用此功能, 应用程序应面向 .NET Framework 版本3.5。To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见 [.NET Framework 版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用菜单项样式中的属性。The following example shows how to use the property in a menu item style. 按下菜单项时, 其前景、文本大小和文本样式的样式会更改。When the menu item is pressed, the style of its foreground, text size, and text style change. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsSubmenuOpen { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否打开 的子菜单。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the submenu of the is open.

value.span: 如果打开 的子菜单，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the submenu of the is open; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为`true`时, 将鼠标捕获设置为及其子树。When is set to `true`, mouse capture is set to the and its subtree. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何打开的子菜单。The following example shows how to open a submenu of a . 在此示例中, 调用`fileMenu`的包含一个`recentFiles`具有子菜单的调用。In this example, the called `fileMenu` contains a called `recentFiles` that has a submenu. 当`fileMenu`打开时 , 将引发`FileMenu_Opened`事件, 并且事件处理程序将打开的子`recentFiles`菜单。When `fileMenu` is opened, the event is raised and the `FileMenu_Opened` event handler opens the submenu of `recentFiles`. [!code-xaml[MenuItems_snip#IsSubMenuOpenMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItems_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#issubmenuopenmenu)] [!code-csharp[MenuItems_snip#IsSubMenuOpen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItems_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#issubmenuopen)] [!code-vb[MenuItems_snip#IsSubMenuOpen](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItems_snip/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#issubmenuopen)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指示菜单是根据基础集合中项的类型还是一些其他的启发方法来选择不同的项容器的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu selects different item containers, depending on the type of the item in the underlying collection or some other heuristic.

value.span: 下拉菜单中选择不同的项容器，为；否则为 。

span.span: the menu selects different item containers; otherwise, .
The registered default is .

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅 [Dependency Property Value Precedence（依赖项属性值优先级）](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望通过绑定到集合来创建菜单, 则此属性很有用。This property is useful if you want to create a menu by binding to a collection. Item 容器是在集合中显示对象的 UI 元素。The item container is the UI element that displays the object in a collection. 如果要绑定到集合以创建包含对象和对象的菜单, 请将属性设置为 true, 并为集合中的每个对象类型创建一个。If you want to bind to a collection to create a menu that contains objects and objects, set the property to true and create an for each type of object in your collection. 每个必须包含或。Each must contain either a or a . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|
